title: Change the Last Commit's Message
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes in their codebase. One of the key features of Git is the ability to modify the commit history. In this challenge, you will learn how to change the last commit's message without changing its contents.

meta.title: Change the Last Commit's Message
meta.description: Learn how to correct a typo in your Git commit message without changing the actual changes.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, change, git, update, commit message, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful change
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
